entry.desc: MALI configure options. Currently not used

TRUE implies MALI is built with support for the Albany library The first-order velocity solver in MALI uses the Albany library. In order to use that velocity solver, MALI must be built with Albany support and linking to Albany must occur when building the E3SM executable. This occurs if this variable is set to TRUE. Note that is only available on a limited set of machines/compilers. This must remain FALSE to run MALI on a machine that does not have Albany, or for which the CIME scripts are not aware of the existence of Albany.
FALSE implies MALI will be run in a static mode
true => do surface mass balance, false => PDD, nec_glc is set to 1
